trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Hammond
There were no other sightings in Hammond on or around May 20th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: On Wednesday, May 18 at about 12:30 a.m., I observed a greenish blue light off the east side state highway 43 North of Interstate 12 near Albany, LA. the light appeared low on the horizon an traveled in an easterly direction at a high rate of speed until disapearing behind a stand of pine trees. The object looked to be like a glowing orb of light very spherical and it is hard to determine the size because I do not know the distance it was from me. I only saw it briefly the one time although; I parked near to the sighting and looked for several minutes to see if it would reappear. It did not reappear and I gave up the vigil after a few minutes. I found out about MUFON after photographing Scott Arnett, an Investigator for Louisiana and Mississippi, for a newspaper article.
